sentences.sContent: As for my unlikely allies, I think that I shall allow them a reprieve.
sentences.sContent_eng: As for my unlikely allies, I think that I shall allow them a reprieve.
sentences.sCn: 至于我的盟友们，我想我应该给他们一个缓刑的机会。

sentences.sContent: You will be converted—you will be converted just as soon as every effort to compass pardon, commutation, or reprieve HAS failed—and then!
sentences.sContent_eng: You will be converted—you will be converted just as soon as every effort to compass pardon, commutation, or reprieve HAS failed—and then!
sentences.sCn: 您会痛悔前非——就在人们为您恳求赦免、申请减刑、或改判缓刑的一切努力统告失败的时候，您会痛悔前非的。

remMethod.val: re(后)+priev(＝prehend 抓住) → 抓住放在后面 → 暂不执行死刑 → 缓刑

trans.tranOther: to officially stop a prisoner from being killed as a punishment
a delay before something bad happens or continues to happen
